duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain high-quality patient care, communication, and mentoring at the veterinary practice.
Enforce a strict policy in regard to referral cases to maintain trust with local referral DVMs.
Lead, mentor, and advise Associate Veterinarians to deliver outstanding, high-quality medical care.
Identify potential problems and formulate solutions to remove barriers in medical operations.
Maintain a 3–4-day schedule to provide emergency and critical care services.
Ensure compliance with state Veterinary Board License requirements and maintain a flexible work schedule.

education_certification.credential: State Veterinary Board License in good standing
